mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PERFORMANCE p JOIN MEETING m ON p.meetingno=m.meetingno WHERE enabled='1' ORDER BY perform_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PERFORMANCE p JOIN MEETING m ON p.meetingno=m.meetingno WHERE enabled='1' AND place like '%'||#{town}||'%' ORDER BY perform_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PERFORMANCE p JOIN MEETING m ON p.meetingno=m.meetingno WHERE enabled='1' AND performanceno=#{performanceNo}

SELECT performanceno,operator,meetingname,main_img,title,perform_date,perform_time,place,content FROM PERFORMANCE p JOIN MEETING m ON p.meetingno=m.meetingno WHERE enabled='1' AND m.meetingno=#{meetingNo} ORDER BY perform_date DESC
